original_title: A Luz Incidiu Sobre Nós Como A Pálida Noite
overview: The Light fell on us like the pale night is a short film. The narrative revolves around a family relationship between two young women that return home after their sister’s Agda death. Upon returning to the scene, questions about the family and their relationship come back to create a tension between the sisters and especially in Isis, who believes that can communicate with Agda through the light.
title: A Luz Incidiu Sobre Nós Como A Pálida Noite
